summary: The gang is back, leaving Paris' fading Sentier district for the thriving suburb of Aubervilliers, where they must share the market with Chinese wholesalers. All's well until they fall victim to the local Mafioso's scheme.
cast: Richard Anconina|José Garcia|Bruno Solo|Vincent Elbaz|Gilbert Melki|Aure Atika|Amira Casar|Léa Drucker|Elisa Tovati|Marc Andréoni|Enrico Macias|Nicole Calfan|Gladys Cohen|Lucien Layani|Cyril Hanouna|Daniel Cohen|Jean-Claude Tran|Rachel Suissa|Scali Delpeyrat|Jean-François Gallotte|Toni Hristov|Dany Brillant|Jeanne Bournaud|Agathe Marit|Sarah Faure|Loubna Satori|Alessandro Togni Bouglione|Max Boublil|Anna Sherbinina|Luc Schwartz|Jean-Marc Nigoghossian|Romain Lévy|Jean-Claude Hadida|Charles Cohen|Mercedès Zarka|Loy's Dany|Isaac Sharry|Serge Bensoussan|Serge Malik|Michel Cymès|Manesca De Ternay|Claude Barichasse|Edward Mayor|Carl Johan Liljewall|Lionel Nizard|Fabio Bouhnik|Manuel Ferreira|Jean-Noël Martin|Axel Wursten|Constance Stalla|Longmon Wang|Hiep Tran Nghia|Bo Zhou|Moon Dailly|Guy Amram|Jacques Mayer|Muriel Combeau|Priscilla de Laforcade|Serpentine Teyssier|Bernard Bolzinger|Emmanuel Ferre|Ludovic Berthillot|Arnaud Maillard|Jean Kinsella|Alain Coupeaux|Cathy Darietto|Lionel Briand|Jérôme Federlen|Rémy Le Fur|Denis Penot|Ca Yu|Qiu Lan|Gaël Cottat|Eric Munz|Olga Korotyayeva|Esther Haddad|Luis Lu|Quanzhong Dou|Yun-Ping He|Eva Jarriau|Janis Munz|Laurent Casanova|François-Marie Nivon|Sandra Rosinsky|David Serero
title: La vérité si je mens! 3
